name: Killer Love Prototype
description:
Are you looking for love? 

Great! You came to the right place!

Camp GeeTeeEffOh has quite the selection for you, lover boy. Unfortunately, they are a bunch of psycho killers. 

But hey! We take what we can get!

DEV NOTES: This is an early prototype. There is little to no gameplay at the campsite. I am fleshing out the structure and narrative within this first iteration. 

Here is the plan: 

Game Vision: Killer Love is a horror dating sim game. As the player attempts to pursue their selected love interest, the love interest attempts to murder them. The player must dodge traps and tricks played by the Killer. Each Killer will have their unique quirk (such as cannibalism) and will attempt to capture the player in thematic ways. The player must strategize and outsmart the killer to find love.
